channel.title: Help me get 20GB of music. SUGGEST SOME BANDS!
channel.description:
Hey I currently have 10+GB of music (2100+ Songs). And I would like to get to the 20GB mark. If you could suggest any bands I should try out it would appreciated. I use http://albumbase.com almost always. Limewire for the odd song. And the occasional warez site if I can't find what I am looking for. I will provide a list of bands im into. My favourite music is 80's metal. But I will vary. I almost always listen to rock or metal though;
Please remember. I don't care if you don't like "insert band here" they suck. There my tastes. I have albums that i like and albums I don't like. There are some bands here I don't even listen to/anymore.
[shadow=red,left][size=10pt][u][b]Bands I Listen To[/b][/u][/size][/shadow] AC/DC Aerosmith Amorphis Anthrax Billy Thorpe & The Aztecs Biohazard Black Sabbath Blue October Buckethead Cannibal Corpse Children Of Bodom Cold Chisel Combichrist Cream Deep Purple Death Disturbed Drowning Pool Eskimo Joe Fear Factory Good Charlotee Gorillaz Grand Theft Auto - Vice City Soundtrack Greenday Hatebreed Hilltop Hoods In Flames Iron Maiden Job For A Cowboy Korn Lamb Of God Led Zeppelin Lordi Limp Bizkit Machine Head Meat Loaf Megadeth Metallica Midnight Oil Misfits Moonspell Motorhead Mudvayne Nickelback Nightwish Nine Inch Nails No Mercy Opeth Overkill Pantera Papa Roach Pink Floyd Queen Queens Of The Stone Age Rage Against The Machine Rise Against Saw I OST Saw II OST Saw III OST Saxon Slayer Slipknot Static-X Suicidal Tendacies System Of A Down The Cat Empire The Doors The Fray George Thorogood The Living End The Rolling Stones The Who The Fast and The Furious; Tokyo Drift OST Tool Uriah Heep Vision Of Disorder "Werid al" Yankovich Whiplash Yes ZZ Top
[size=10pt][b][u]Bands that are already been mentioned or are on the list to be downloaded:[/u][/b][/size]
Sodom Stam1na Venom Xentrix Mayhem Danzig Nuclear Assault Kreator Destruction Dirty Rotten Imbociles Judas Priest Tankard Exodus Testament Exciter Razor Forbidden Vio-lence The Accused Cryptic Slaughter Sacrifice Possessed Dark Angel Annihilator Helloween Vendetta Onslaught
[size=10pt][shadow=red,left][u][b]BANDS NOT TO SUGGEST![/b][/u][/shadow][/size] My Chemical Romance AFI Panic! At the disco Bullet For My Valentine Fall Out Boy The Used
I bitterly hate those bands. Don't bother suggesting them. Remember this is only an opinion but I will not listen to them. Anyway I need at least 2000 Songs more and I would like to have as many bands as I can get.
